description:
Rockstar Games co-founder Dan Houser may have included an advanced AI as a plot in his new novel, A Better Paradise: Volume One - An Aftermath, but he's not as impressed with the current state of the technology. During a recent appearance, Houser didn't completely downplay AI, but he noted that the technology isn't everything some of its proponents have made it out to be.

While making a guest appearance on Channel 4's Sunday Brunch, Houser acknowledged that his upcoming video game based on A Better Paradise may have some AI. But he also warned that the technology behind AI can't live up to its biggest promises yet.

"We are dabbling in using AI, but the truth is a lot of it's not as useful as some of the companies would have you believe yet," said Houser. "It's not going to solve all of the problems, you know. W
title: Ex-GTA Boss Dan Houser Thinks AI Is Overrated

description:
The first season of Black Ops 7 and Warzone arrives on December 4, and Activision has revealed the full roadmap of content players can expect for this new season of Call of Duty. Season 1 adds Black Ops 7's integration into Warzone, a new battle pass, DLC weapons to unlock, and more maps across all modes. Seasonal holiday events are also included, and the campaign's Endgame mode gets new world events with massive bosses to fight.


Call of Duty Season 1 start times


Call of Duty Season 1 arrives to Black Ops 7 and Warzone on December 4, and the update will go live at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET / 5
title: CoD: Black Ops 7 And Warzone Season 1 Adds More Maps, Weapons, And Warzone Integration
Lego Minecraft Crafting Table Diorama Gets Huge Price Cut For Black Friday

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone's Season 1 arrives on December 4, and alongside new maps, guns, and modes, there is a new BlackCell DLC bundle coming.

The centerpiece of the new BlackCell offering is the new operator, Scorn, who is exclusive to the BlackCell offering. Beyond the new playable character, the new BlackCell DLC pack lets players grind through a BlackCell path of the Season 1 Battle Pass, and it unlocks all of this content immediately:

  • The “Scorn” BlackCell Operator Skin. This Operator is also unlocked for you to use.
  • 1,100 COD Points
  • The “Ultimatum” Mastercraft Blueprint for the Carbon 57 SMG with Triangular Yellow Tracers and Shimmering Deletion Death FX
  • The “Heavy Fire” Companion Finishing Move, featuring Dorne’s pet D.A.W.G.
  • The “Clock Out” Gun Screen you can attach to any weapon that accepts it.
  • The
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 BlackCell DLC Revealed For Season 1, How To Unlock It And Everything It Includes

description:
Much like The Witcher 3's Gwent card game, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's dice game is now a collectible you can buy and play in real life. Farkle Dice wasn't an invention of the game's developer, Warhorse Studios, but it's fitting that Deliverance 2 has received a branded version of it that's available for purchase.

If you've ever wanted to bring a bit of #KCD2 into real life... this farkle set exists
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Dice Game Is Now Available IRL

description:
The gates are open - and a new era of Hunters has arrived. Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE brings the legendary rise of Sung Jinwoo to life like never before, capturing every ounce of heart, grit, and power that made Solo Leveling a global phenomenon. Available now on PC via Steam and Xbox PC, the game invites players to step into Jinwoo’s shoes and carve their own path from E-Rank underdog to unstoppable Shadow Monarch. With breathtaking visuals, cinematic storytelling, and exhilarating combat, this is Solo Leveling unleashed.

What is Solo Leveling?
title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Delivers A Gorgeous, High-Action Experience

description:
Pokemon Legends Z-A: Mega Dimension is set to launch next month, and excitement is already building as fans anticipate its Hoopa-focused storyline and the return of several classic Pokemon, including new Mega Evolutions. To mark the upcoming release, The Pokemon Company is partnering with the Pikachu Sweets Pokemon Cafe in Tokyo to introduce a themed menu inspired directly by the DLC's mysteries and motifs. These limited-time offerings aim to give fans a preview of what awaits in the expansion, in an edible form.

The highlight of the promotion is a pair of striking new donuts, currently referred to only as the Red Donut and Blue Donut--names chosen to avoid spoilers before launch. Despite the intentionally vague labels, the
title: Real-Life Pokemon Mega Dimension Donuts Could Hint At Returning Legendary Pokemon

description:
When it was announced in September 2025, Pokemon Pokopia appeared to be the franchise's cozy-game answer to Animal Crossing and Minecraft. But after the recently released extended trailer for the game, fans have pointed out intriguing and dark links to some of the previous titles in the franchise.

It's almost unsettling that one of the first things seen in the extended trailer is a devastated Pokemon Center and a generation-one Pokedex. As noted on Reddit (via Eurogamer), one of the fan theories suggests that Pokopia is set on Cinnabar Islan
title: Fan Theories Link Pokemon Pokopia To Older Games In The Franchise

description:
In Of Ash and Steel, you play as a cartographer named Tristan. After being shipwrecked on the island of Greyshaft and subsequently seeing the entire crew murdered, it's up to you to survive on your own. From rolling hills and lush fields to dense forests and snow-capped hills, you're bound to venture forth into an unforgiving wilderness.

Our Of Ash and Steel guide has several tips to help you get started. We discuss some core features, such as the attributes and skill system. We also take a look at some early-game objectives that lead you to Grayshaft's capital city and beyond.


Rely on contextual clues due to a lack of quest markers
title: Of Ash And Steel Tips: 14 Things To Know Before You Play This Hardcore RPG

description:
A harmless prophecy turned into confusion about whether Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet would show up at The Game Awards next month. But the Naughty Dog title reportedly won't be seen at the show.

Giant Bomb's Jeff Grubb confirmed that Intergalactic won't appear at The Game Awards in December. Additionally, Grubb also stated on X that Intergalactic isn't coming out in 2026. These details were discovered after a weird sort of telephone game played out on the internet, starting with a prediction about Intergalactic by Colin Moriarty, the Last Stand Media owner, who later addressed the situation on X over the weekend.

Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet - Trailer, Story, Setting
title: Don't Expect Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet To Appear At The Game Awards - Report

description:
Microsoft's next product category has emerged: shoes. More specifically, Microsoft is teaming up with Crocs, Inc. for a new line of Xbox-branded Crocs and themed Jibbitz.

The shoes go on sale tomorrow, November 25, so you don't have to wait very long to get your feet into them. The $80 shoes have been "designed with gamers in mind," the company said.

The individual black-and-green shoes are labeled "Player Left" and "Player Right," and include fixed joysticks and buttons on them, replicating the Xbox controller. Crocs will also sell a
title: Take A Look At These Xbox Crocs And Marvel At The Wonder Of Them

description: Final Fantasy Magic: The Gathering Restocks and Deals
title: Final Fantasy Magic: The Gathering Commander Deck Is Over 50% Off For Black Friday

description:
After three years of mysteriously absent email-checking, Strong Bad has finally smashed his boxing-gloved fists onto the keyboard once more, returning with a brand-new message for his loyal fans. And in true Strong Bad fashion, it's about robots--again--and this time they apparently want to discuss their favorite sauces. His comeback feels like stepping back into Free Country, USA itself: chaotic, ridiculous, and somehow still deeply important to a generation. It also offers the perfect opportunity to revisit the era when Strong Bad and the rest of the Homestar Runner cast broke out of browser windows and into full-fledged video games.

The most defining gaming moment for the franchise came with the Telltale game Strong Bad’s Cool Game for Attractive People, a five-episode point-and-click adventure released throughout 2008. The game played like an interactive Homesta
title: Internet (And Gaming) Icon Strong Bad Returns With New Email After Three Years

description:
The Assassin's Creed series "exceeded" Ubisoft's expectations for the latest quarter, the French publisher has confirmed, while also providing updates on the success of the last two big games, Mirage and Shadows.

In its latest earnings briefing, Ubisoft said the Assassin's Creed series overall "posted a strong performance" in the latest quarter, including sales of the newest game, Shadows, and back-catalog titles. The Assassin's Creed series had more than 211 million "session days" so far in 2025, which is about 35% higher than the average for the past two years, Ubisoft said.

Ubisoft added that the recent launch of the New Game+ mode for Shadows benefitted the game, as did the Claws of Awaji expansion. The publisher said the game now stands to "reach a broader audience" when it releases for Nintendo Switch 2 on December 2.
title: Assassin's Creed Exceeded Expectations For Ubisoft, Mirage Hits 10 Million Players

description:
After a relatively brief season that had no big star leading the show, Fortnite Festival is returning to normal for Chapter 7. The next headlining artist for Harmonix's rhythm game will be Lisa, the singer/rapper/dancer/actor best known as a member of Blackpink. Lisa will have a skin and jam track on the new Starlux music pass, and she'll also have a set of cosmetics in the item shop for the duration of the season, which begins November 29.

The Starlux music pass launches on
title: Blackpink's Lisa is Fortnite Festival's Next Season Headliner

description:
The muted response to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 from critics and fans appears to have translated into lower sales for the futuristic first-person shooter, with the game reportedly falling behind competitors in a few regions. The Game Business described Black Ops 7's European launch as "disappointing," citing GSD, which tracks physical and digital sales data.

Sales numbers for Black Ops 7's opening week are 63% below those of Battlefield 6, and The Game Business also estimates that sales are over 50% down compared to last year's Black Ops 6. Even still, the GSD numbers indicate that Black Ops 7 was still the top-selling game in Europe during its opening week.

Despite Japan not being a key market for the Call of Duty franchise, sales numbers there show a similar trend, with
title: First Reported Black Ops 7 Regional Sales Numbers Are Unimpressive

description:
Bethesda did a shadowdrop for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered earlier this year, and it was a big success. Another Bethesda-published game, Hi-Fi Rush, had a shadowdrop as well. Now, Bethesda Game Studios director Tom Mustaine is openly calling for more releases of this type in the future from other developers across the industry.

Speaking to GamesRadar, Mustaine said the shadowdrop approach is a favorite of Bethesda boss Todd Howard, and releasing games like this can be a way to reach players who may have short attention spans.

"We all have short attention spans now," he said. "There's Grand Theft Auto, for example. I want that today, right? So it is an interesting strategy .
title: Bethesda Dev Wants More Shadowdrops Because "We All Have Short Attention Spans Now"

description:
Embark Studios' mega-popular extraction shooter Arc Raiders has some competition on Steam's most-played game chart, as there's a newcomer on the list: the free-to-play, open-world Wuxia fighter Where Winds Meet.

Where Winds Meet is the debut title from Chinese developer Everstone Studio. Set during ancient China's Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period (about 907 to 979 AD), the game is this fantastical amalgam of MMO, action-adventure, and RPG mechanics that seamlessly blends into an open-world environment you can play either in solo or multiplayer modes. There are epic sword fights with flashy combos, Tai Chi moves to basically force-throw animals and enemies, and bosses that rival a From Software game in size and difficulty. Not to mention the wealth of content in the first two regions--Kaifeng and Qinghe--that easily contain hundreds of hours of stuff t
title: Steam's Hottest Game Right Now Is A Free-To-Play Wuxia Sim

description:
Valve will not say what the Steam Machine's price is just yet, and in this information vacuum, people are offering all kinds of different theories and guesses as to what the six-inch cube-like system may cost. Now, Valve has yet again commented on the pricing question, providing potentially the best clue yet, while also saying the company cannot or will not disclose pricing yet due to "a lot of external things."

Speaking to Skill Up--which is co-hosted by GameSpot's Lucy James--Valve software engineer Pierre-Loup Griffais said people can expect the price of the Steam Machine to be close to what it might cost to build a PC with "
title: Steam Machine Price: Valve May Have Just Given The Best Clue Yet

description:
Legendary German actor Udo Kier has died at the age of 81. The news was confirmed by Kier's partner Delbert McBride via Variety.

With hundreds of film and TV credits spanning decades, Kier rose to fame in horror films like Mark of the Devil, Flesh for Frankenstein, and Blood for Dracula in the '70s. His breakthrough Hollywood role came in 1991's My Own Private Idaho, and he'd go on to appear in Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, Johnny Mnemonic, Armageddon, and Madonna music videos.

In recent years, Kier was one of the actors set to appear in Hideo Kojima's upcoming horror game OD. Game director Hideo Kojima wrote online that new scenes featuring the actor were scheduled to be filmed in 2026, and that he'd kept in touch with him regularly.
title: Udo Kier Dies At 81, With Kojima Honoring The Red Alert Icon And OD Actor
Persona 3 Reload Switch 2 Edition Is Down To $40 For Black Friday
Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Gets Its First Big Discount For Black Friday
